name: Unmasking the Brain Burglar (Teljoor)
description:
A face-poking puzzle game made for wizard jam 8. Inspector Fetchem returns to match wits with the nefarious Brain Burglar! Can you see through his many disguises?

Playable in browser or through a standalone download.

Controls
- Mouse: move cursor
- Left Mouse Button: interact
- Escacpe: quit (only in standalone version)
